name: Snowman 'Star' Cookies
author: Anonymous
summary: Who says you need a snowman cookie cutter to make frosty cookies? Use a star-shaped cutter to create a new angle on snowmen cookies.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound 1.5 ounce) pouch Betty Crocker® sugar cookie mix
⅓ cup butter or margarine, softened
1 (4.25 ounce) tube Betty Crocker® black decorating icing
1 (12 ounce) tub Betty Crocker® Whipped fluffy white frosting
¼ cup Coarse white decorating sugar
directions: In medium bowl, stir cookie mix, flour, butter and egg until soft dough forms
On lightly floured surface, roll dough to about 1/8-inch thickness
With star-shaped cookie cutter, cut out stars; place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets
Bake 7 to 9 minutes or until edges are light golden brown
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets to cooling racks
Frost and decorate 1 cookie at a time
Pipe black icing on tip of star for hat
Frost remaining star with white frosting
Attach candies for buttons and face
